thread.title: Driver dies in M6 motorway crash near Corley Services
thread.title_full: Driver dies in M6 motorway crash near Corley Services

title: Driver dies in M6 motorway crash near Corley Services
text:
Driver dies in M6 motorway crash near Corley Services 5 February 2017 Image caption The crash happened near Corley services A driver died when his car crashed on the M6 motorway in Warwickshire. 
The crash happened on the southbound carriageway between junction 3a and Corley Services just before 11:15 GMT on Saturday, police said. 
The man, in his 50s and from Birmingham, was declared dead at the scene. 
PC Stephen Barr said police wanted to speak to anyone who saw the crash or the man's grey Mini Cooper "in the minutes leading up to the collision". 
"I'd like to thank people for their patience while the road was closed and also the other emergency services for their help at the scene," he said.
